query: Review termination clauses, GDPR compliance, and payment penalties

extracted_clauses: This Service Agreement may be terminated by either party with 30 days written notice.
Either party may terminate this Agreement immediately if the other party materially breaches any term.
This agreement is governed by the laws of California.
Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of San Francisco County.
evidence: This Service Agreement may be terminated by either party with 30 days written notice.
Either party may terminate this Agreement immediately if the other party materially breaches any term.
This agreement is governed by the laws of California.
Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of San Francisco County.

extracted_clauses: The Contractor shall comply with all GDPR requirements for data protection.
All personal data must be encrypted and stored in SOC2 certified facilities.
The service maintains ISO 27001 certification for information security.
HIPAA compliance is maintained for all healthcare-related data.
Data breach notification must be provided within 72 hours as per GDPR.
evidence: The Contractor shall comply with all GDPR requirements for data protection.
All personal data must be encrypted and stored in SOC2 certified facilities.
The service maintains ISO 27001 certification for information security.
HIPAA compliance is maintained for all healthcare-related data.
Data breach notification must be provided within 72 hours as per GDPR.

extracted_clauses: Payment is due net 30 days from invoice date.
Late payments will incur a 2% monthly penalty fee.
An additional late fee of $50 applies for payments overdue by more than 15 days.
All fees are non-refundable once services are rendered.
Interest charges of 1.5% per month apply to overdue balances.
Payment default may result in service suspension and additional penalties.
